meanings.definition: Having the greatest degree of slant.
meanings.sent1: The hill was the slantiest one in the whole area.
meanings.sent2: She placed the picture frame on the slantiest shelf.
meanings.sent3: The slantiest tree in the forest looked like it was leaning in for a hug.
meanings.sent4: The slantiest roof in the neighborhood made the house stand out.
meanings.sent5: The slantiest road on the mountain was a thrilling challenge to drive on.

meanings.definition: In a slanting or oblique manner.
meanings.sent1: She placed the mirror slantiest against the wall.
meanings.sent2: The light shone slantiest through the window.
meanings.sent3: He walked slantiest to avoid the puddles on the path.
meanings.sent4: The ball rolled slantiest down the hill.
meanings.sent5: The rain fell slantiest, creating a soothing sound on the roof.
